sub_title: Digital Assets | Finance | Data Management | Technology
summary:
BACKGROUND
20+ years of experience in financial and other sectors in management and consultancy roles on the intersection of finance, data and technology. 

Active in trading stocks, etf's and digital assets for years in my own time. Particularly the latter gained my attention in 2017 and never lost my interest ever since. After helping friends and acquaintances to gain a better understanding of the WHY, WHAT and HOW of this industry, I started my own company in 2022.

I'm now active as a free lance consultant (finance) data management & analytics for organisations and personal trainer & coach on digital assets and blockchains for retail customers.

PREVIOUS JOBS (a.o.)
•	Managing Consultant Data & Analytics at Alten
•	Manager BICC at Van Lanschot Kempen
•	Manager BI & Analytics at KPMG

KNOWLEDGE & EXPERIENCE
•	IT system design and implementations
•	On prem, cloud and blockchain architectures
•	Data Management and Governance
•	Digital Asset Management (crypto/nft)
•	Business Intelligence & Analytics
•	Finance & Control
•	ERP, DWH, Reporting, Dashboarding


KEY STRENGTHS
•	Team player; Analytical; Drive for high quality results; 
•	Ability to combine 'helicopter view' with eye for detail, design and user experience
•	Ability to explain complex matters clear and simple
•	Broad knowledge base and in depth knowledge of many disciplines
•	Experienced as Trusted Advisor, Auditor, Project Manager (Prince II and Agile), General Manager.

education.field_of_study: mySAP Financials - Managerial and Financial accounting

projects.title: Data Quality and Securitization

projects.title: Data Quality Management for Asset Management
projects.description: As senior data management consultant assisting PGGM Pension fund services with the realization of the data governance and data quality ambitions in their asset management branche. As workstream lead I was responsible for the design of templates, standards, procedures and good practices as well as the education of data stewards.

projects.title: BI Team integration
projects.description: As Manager responsible for the integration of two different BI teams: Finance BI (3 FTE, Van Lanschot) and Management Information Services (4 FTE, Kempen & Co) into a single BICC.

contributors.headline: Digital Assets | Finance | Data Management | Technology

projects.title: BI Tool Selection
projects.description:
Sector: Financial Services
Role: Project leader 
Responsibilities: Select the best fitting BI tooling for the company, based on width and depth of functionalities, ease of use and development, local ecosystem, initial investment and total costs annually. The project included a comparison of the latest release of the BI tooling in use with competing products based on a mixture of reports from market analists, reviews by users and other sources, a full scale requirements analysis with end users, IT and BI, RFI, PoC and RFP phases.

contributors.headline: Digital Assets | Finance | Data Management | Technology

projects.title: Data Governance
projects.description:
Sector: Financial Services
Role: Member of the Data Governance Office (DGO)
Responsibilities: Help set up a Data Governance structure including the DGO. Educate and coach the new data governance officer in setting up a data governance body, determining a vision and start up initiatives for its realization such as workshops and presentations.

contributors.headline: Digital Assets | Finance | Data Management | Technology

projects.title: Enterprise Architecture Principles

Set up a the Enterprise Architecture Board in preparation of a permanent Lead Architect that eventually took office on 1 July 2015.

profile_positions.description:
With a background in finance, data and technology: 
1. Helping organisations overcome a broad spectrum of data and technology related challenges: Data and BI governance, Data Quality Management, Software Selection and Implementation, Reporting and Analytics
2. Enabling retail investors to gain a deep understanding of the fundamentals and potential of digital assets and blockchain technology + providing them with the tools for researching, trading and managing their assets safely and securely.
profile_positions.title: Owner/ Founder

profile_positions.description:
1. Helping client organisations with a broad spectrum of data related challenges: e.g. strategy, governance, reporting, analytics and technology
2. Knowledge and competence development
3. Pre-sales and marketing

profile_positions.description: Delivery of a wide variety of services regarding SAP ERP Financial Accounting (FI) and Controlling (CO) such as system configuration, design and implementation of datamodels, administration integration, interface design, quality monitoring, implementation and user support.
profile_positions.title: Consultant SAP ERP Financials

profile_positions.description: Interim member Billing team solving billing issues.
profile_positions.title: Temporary Business Analyst

company.name: Human Capital Group (previously part of Deloitte)

profile_positions.description:
Internship to work on my thesis on (potential) collisions of corporate cultures between merging companies. The result was a scientific  methodology to measure and analyze differences in corporate cultures of companies that consider a merger/ acquisition during the due diligence phase to predict and/or to use for pre emptive measures against potential cultural collisions.

The thesis was rewarded with a 9 (A+) and acknowledged by the university as a solid base for further PhD research (not pursued).
profile_positions.title: Masters Intern

company.name: Chemgas Shipping BV (previously part of VOPAK)

profile_positions.location: Buenos Aires, Argentina and Rotterdam, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
Business analyst for an international, petrochemical shipping company. 
Responsibilities: Analyze and document the Argentinian market for petrochemical shipping including potential suppliers, petrochemical plants and the transport sector and advize on potential joint venture partners and investment opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Intern
